Class Animation

java.lang.Object
engine.Animation
public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
this class is used to manage animation

gautier

      hasAnimation - if he has an animation
      graphicsManager - to get animation bufferedImage
      id - id to entity who need animation
      faction - faction of the entity
